word_mean: 应激性，刺激感受性，兴奋性：准备对刺激发起反应

sentence.Network_en: She has always been inclined to excitability.
His wife's calm nature acts as a counterbalance to his excitability.
sentence.Network_cn: 他妻子的沉着冷静抵销了他的急性子脾气.

sentence.Network_en: His wife's calm acts as a counterbalance to his excitability.
sentence.Network_cn: 他妻子生性从容不迫,这对他的易冲动的个性起著平衡作用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 兴奋性(Excitability)是心肌细胞和组织对刺激（或其他部位心肌传来的电兴奋）的反应能力，表现为产生动作电位，可以说兴奋性是心 …
生理_百度百科 ... 【生理】能动的 motile 【生理】应激性 excitability 【生理】同化作用 assimilation.
(四) 激感性生物接受外来刺激,能通过内在兴奋和调节,表现出有规律的应答活动,称为激感性(excitability)。单细胞生物的趋化性、趋光性,植物根系的向地性、向水性.
2. excitability indexexcitability 兴奋性; 可激发性; 灵敏性; 刺激感受性; 励磁性excitable 兴奋的

list.abs: 花语_互动百科 ... 隐居（ SecludedLife） 兴奋（excitement）（ Excitement） 乡愁（ Traveler'sSentiment）.
常用物理英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... evaporation 蒸发 excitation 激发 excitation state 激发态.
从A到Y开头的英语单词大全_百度文库 ... evening 夜晚；晚上 excited 兴奋的 F fall 秋天.
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Hopeful 有希望的 Excite 刺激，使兴奋 Active 积极的.

entry.def: If you describe someone as excitable, you mean that they behave in a rather nervous way and become excited very easily.

example.ex: Mary sat beside Elaine, who today seemed excitable...
example.tran: 玛丽坐在伊莱恩身边，伊莱恩今天似乎有些激动。

example.ex: The staff were somewhat alarmed by the man, who was in an excitable state.
example.tran: 那个情绪激动的男人让职员们感到有些恐慌。

means.word_mean: 1. excessive sensitivity of an organ or body part

auth_sentence.content: Magnetic fields might be dampening the excitability of brain cells.
